title: Disney - Lilo & Stitch The Series / Compact Box 2 (4DVDS) [Japan DVD] VWDS-5854

This compact box is a set of 4 DVD tanks, yarp, angel, elastico, and all 16 episodes from Disney's popular character "Stitch."
